sheet.text: While I was exploring Kronos Island with Sonic, I noticed lights would appear on the ground or on the trunks of the trees at night. What was up with that?
You must be talking about the Phantom Lights. Cyber Space is always filled with a vast amount of data, but sometimes it overflows through the portals.
That data is the faint thoughts of the Ancients, appearing in the real world as light.
So they're thoughts without shape, like the Koco... Why do they only appear at night?
They're usually in hiding, for fear of the being that destroyed them. And when the moon rises, they feel safe enough to come out...
Hmph, the poor little things... they've already lost their bodies, yet they're still afraid of being destroyed.
